// frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashboard.js import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Dashboard = ({ user, setCurrentPage }) => { // Use useEffect to set the current page when component mounts useEffect(() => { if (setCurrentPage && typeof setCurrentPage === 'function') { setCurrentPage('dashboard'); } }, [setCurrentPage]); return (
